snippet: The administration said it would test new methods of paying for prescription drugs to slow the growth of Medicare spending on medicines.
abstract: Federal officials announce plans to test new methods for paying for prescription drugs; intention is to both temper growth of Medicare spending on pharmaceuticals and give doctors greater incentives for choosing lowest-cost but most effective therapies for patients.
lead_paragraph: The administration said it would test new methods of paying for prescription drugs to slow the growth of Medicare spending on medicines.

headline.main: U.S. to Test Ways to Cut Drug Prices in Medicare
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Test Ways to Cut Drug Costs in Medicare
